UPDATE.LOG:
security/openvpn-devel: switch to Gitlab and new maintainer
The previous maintainer asked that the port be removed, but we seem to have found a better solution. Gert Doering volunteered to take over the port and reference Git directly.
Import security/openvpn fix for leftover .orig files.
PR: 256209 Maintainer change implicitly Approved by: ecrist@secure-computing.net (removal request) New contents reviewed and Approved by: gert@greenie.muc.de (new maintainer, by IRC/mail)
MFH because original port no longer fetchable, Eric F. Crist removed his download files.
(cherry picked from commit 9364842b3b08f9eaa49bf80c7c14550c2689ab7f)

COMMIT.Subject: security/openvpn-devel: switch to Gitlab and new maintainer
